properties.description: This code is written to read daily Parquet files and perform the transformation to create Table for Inverters' Performance.

source: **INVERTER TABLE WITH VARIOUS DAY-LEVEL FEATURES LIKE: Energy, SpY, Donwtime, Wake-UpTime, SleepTime, EnergyLost, Efficiency**

import pandas as pd 
import datetime
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
import pyspark.sql.functions as sf
from datetime import datetime 
from datetime import date 
from datetime import timedelta
# from pyspark.sql.functions import to_date
from datetime import time
import pytz
from pathlib import Path
import pymsteams
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

pattoreadparquet = "abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/allcsvtoparquet/dt="
LoopCounter=1
tz = pytz.timezone('Asia/Kolkata')
todaydate = datetime.date(datetime.now(tz))
print(todaydate)
mintime = datetime.min.time()
DateList =[]
while LoopCounter <= 1 :
    DateList.append( datetime.date ( (datetime.combine(todaydate, mintime) - timedelta(days=LoopCounter)) ))
    LoopCounter += 1
DateListLength = len(DateList)
print(DateList)
TableLoopCounter = 0
DateLoopCounter = 0

location1 = pattoreadparquet   
location1= location1+ str(DateList[DateLoopCounter])+str("/")
print(location1)

missing_inverters_tags=[ ("ICR"+str(i[1:3])+"..INV"+str(i[-1])+".kW").replace("0","") for i in df_Static["Inv"].to_list() if i not in dfc1["Inv"].to_list()]

df2=df2[df2['itemname'].str.startswith('ICR', na=True)]
df1=df1[df1['itemname'].str.startswith('ICR', na=True)]
df1=df1[df1['itemname'].str.contains('INVERTER_EFFICIENCY', na=True)]

df2=df2[df2['itemname'].str.contains('kW', na=True)]
df2 = df2[~df2["itemname"].str.contains('DC', na=True)]
missing_inverters_eff_tags=[ ("ICR"+str(i[1:3])+"..INV"+str(i[-1])+".kW").replace("0","") for i in df_Static["Inv"].to_list() if i not in df1_missing_tag_extract["Inv"].to_list()]
missing_inverters_dc_tags=[ ("ICR"+str(i[1:3])+"..INV"+str(i[-1])+".kW").replace("0","") for i in df_Static["Inv"].to_list() if i not in df2_missing_tag_extract["Inv"].to_list()]

data_frame_list=[]
data_frame_inverter_downtime_list=[]
for i in Block1_list:
    if i in missing_inverters_tags:
        continue
    else:
        each_tag_list=[]
        each_tag_list.append(i)
        df_each_tag=df2[df2["itemname"]==i]
        df_each_tag_with_radiation=pd.merge(df_each_tag,Radiation_Block2,how="inner",left_on=["Hour","Minute"],right_on=["Hour","Minute"])
        df_each_tag_with_radiation=df_each_tag_with_radiation.drop_duplicates(subset=["Hour","Minute"]).reset_index(drop=True)
        df_each_tag_with_radiation=df_each_tag_with_radiation[["ISTtime_x","itemname_x","value_x","value_y"]]
        df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern=df_each_tag_with_radiation[(df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]==0) & (df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_y"]!=0)].reset_index(drop=True)
        up_time=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation[df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]!=0]["ISTtime_x"].head(1)).split(" ")[4].split("\n")[0]
        print("Uptime",df_each_tag_with_radiation)
        sleep_time=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation[df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]!=0]["ISTtime_x"].tail(1)).split(" ")[4].split("\n")[0]
        if len(df_each_tag_with_radiation[df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]!=0]["ISTtime_x"].head(1))==0:
            
            up_time="00:00:00.000"     
        else:
            up_time=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation[df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]!=0]["ISTtime_x"].head(1)).split(" ")[4].split("\n")[0]
        if len(df_each_tag_with_radiation[df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]!=0]["ISTtime_x"].tail(1))==0:
            sleep_time="00:00:00.000"
        else:
        
            sleep_time=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation[df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]!=0]["ISTtime_x"].tail(1)).split(" ")[4].split("\n")[0]
        
        Dc_load_Tag=i.split("..")[0]+".."+i.split("..")[1].split(".")[0]+"."+"TODAY_GEN"
        Dc_load=float(df_Static[df_Static["InvEnergy_kWh"]==Dc_load_Tag]["InvDCLoad"].iloc[0])
        print(Dc_load)
        up_time_hour=up_time.split(":")[0]
        up_time_minute=up_time.split(":")[1]
        up_time_second=up_time.split(":")[2].split(".")[0]
        #up_time_millisecond=up_time.split(":")[2].split(".")[1]
        sleep_time_hour=sleep_time.split(":")[0]
        sleep_time_minute=sleep_time.split(":")[1]
        sleep_time_second=sleep_time.split(":")[2].split(".")[0]
        #sleep_time_millisecond=sleep_time.split(":")[2].split(".")[1]
        a1=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(up_time_hour), minutes=int(up_time_minute), seconds=int(up_time_second)) 
        b1=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(sleep_time_hour), minutes=int(sleep_time_minute), seconds=int(sleep_time_second))
        op_minute=(b1-a1).seconds/60
        df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_average=df1[(df1["itemname"]==i.split(".")[0]+".."+i.split(".")[2]+".INVERTER_EFFICIENCY") & (df1["value"]!=0)]["value"].mean()
        df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max=df1[(df1["itemname"]==i.split(".")[0]+".."+i.split(".")[2]+".INVERTER_EFFICIENCY") & (df1["value"]!=0)]["value"].max()
        
        #print(up_time,sleep_time)

            each_tag_list.append(sleep_time)
            each_tag_list.append(op_minute)
            each_tag_list.append(op_minute-np.round(downtime,2))
            each_tag_list.append(np.round(df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_average,4))
            each_tag_list.append(np.round(df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max,4))
            each_tag_list.append(np.round((energy_loss/60000)*df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max*downtime,2))
            data_frame_list.append(each_tag_list)

                    #print("i=",i)

                    minute_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[1])
                    second_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[0])
                    #millisecond_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[1])
                    a=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(hour_i), minutes=int(minute_i), seconds=int(second_i)) 
                    b=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(hour_ii), minutes=int(minute_ii), seconds=int(second_ii))
                    minute=(b-a).seconds/60
                    #print(minute)
                    if minute>8:
                        index_list.append(i)
                else:
                    break
            index_list.append(len(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern)-1)
            downtime=0
            energy_loss=0
            print(index_list)
            for i in range(len(index_list)):
                if i<=(len(index_list)-2):

                    print("Energy_Tag_is",Energy_Tag)
                    #deviation

                    print("deviation is",deviation)

                    print("deviation is",deviation)

                        #millisecond_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[i+1],0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[1])

                        minute=(b-a).seconds/60
                        downtime=downtime+minute

            each_tag_list.append(np.round((energy_loss/20000)*(df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max/100)*Pr*Dc_load,2))
            data_frame_list.append(each_tag_list)
data_frame_list_final.extend(data_frame_list)

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType,StructField,StringType,DateType,FloatType,LongType,DoubleType
schema=StructType([
                    StructField("Date",DateType()),
                    StructField("itemname",StringType()),
                    StructField("Inv",StringType()),
                    StructField("InvEnergy",FloatType()),
                    StructField("InvDowntime",DoubleType()),
                    StructField("InvWakeUp",StringType()),
                    StructField("InvSleep",StringType()),
                    StructField("InvOperationMinutes",DoubleType()),
                    StructField("InvRunningMinutes",DoubleType()),
                    StructField("InvAvgEff",DoubleType()),
                    StructField("InvMaxEff",DoubleType()),
                    StructField("InvEnergyLoss",DoubleType()),

df_spark2=spark.createDataFrame(Table2_Final,schema=schema)
spark.sql("create database if not exists reassets")
df_spark2.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("reassets.invperformance")
